text:
My friend from Okayama keeps sending me
messages like, "Bought the magazine!"

It's kind of strange
how our work reaches that far, isn't it?

Oh, right.
Let's promote Haruki to our friends!

Hehe... Thanks~. But I think your friends
would want to hear about Hana-chan too...
Haha, they're both getting excited, huh?

Hehe, yeah. I never thought
we'd be featured in magazines so quickly.

That's true... It means people have
high expectations for both of you.

It must be a dream come true for people
in your hometown to see your faces every day.

Right... So, we have to work hard
to make that dream come true.
